mapper.sql: Id, Password, UserName, LoginName, Status, AccountType, FADateTime, FAUser, LCDateTime, LCUser, GroupId, RoleId
mapper.insert:
insert into account
Id,
Password,
UserName,
LoginName,
Status,
AccountType,
FADateTime,
FAUser,
LCDateTime,
LCUser,
GroupId,
RoleId,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{password,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
#{username,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
#{loginname,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
#{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{accounttype,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{fadatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{fauser,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
#{lcdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{lcuser,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
#{groupid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{roleid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update account
Password = #{password,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
UserName = #{username,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
LoginName = #{loginname,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
Status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
AccountType = #{accounttype,jdbcType=INTEGER},
FADateTime = #{fadatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FAUser = #{fauser,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
LCDateTime = #{lcdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LCUser = #{lcuser,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
GroupId = #{groupid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
RoleId = #{roleid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where Id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update account set Password = #{password,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, UserName = #{username,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, LoginName = #{loginname,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, Status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, AccountType = #{accounttype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, FADateTime = #{fadatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FAUser = #{fauser,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, LCDateTime = #{lcdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LCUser = #{lcuser,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, GroupId = #{groupid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, RoleId = #{roleid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where Id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT TOP 1 [Id] ,[Password] ,[UserName] ,[LoginName] ,[Status] ,[AccountType] ,[FADateTime] ,[FAUser] ,[LCDateTime] ,[LCUser] ,[GroupId] ,[RoleId] FROM [account] with(nolock) where LoginName=#{username,jdbcType=NVARCHAR} AND Password=#{password,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}
